full_summary:
================

### Title

**National Capital Region Temporary Help Services**

### Reference Number

cb-6243-77662087

### Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defense (DND) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Brief Description

Department of National Defense requires Temporary Help Services.

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of National Defense
* Contracting Entity Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON K2H8G1, Canada

### Submission Requirements

* Only Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under Stream 13.11- Strategist are eligible to submit a proposal.
* The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:
	+ 1019837 Ontario Inc.
	+ Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
	+ Connecting Humans Inc.
	+ Excel Human Resources Inc.
	+ Gartner Canada Co.
	+ IBISKA Telecom Inc.
	+ Maverin Inc.
	+ Quarry Consulting Inc.
	+ S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
	+ SEASI Consulting Inc.
	+ SoftSim Technologies Inc.
	+ Systemscope Inc.
	+ The Bell Telephone Company of Canada or Bell Canada/La Compagnie de Téléphone Bell du Canada ou Bell Canada
	+ TRM Technologies Inc.
	+ Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

### Tender Status

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-13T12:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired

### Level of Security Requirement

* Level of Security Requirement: Top Secret

### Description

Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.

### Request for Proposals

The Request for Proposals package can be found at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6243/s4437666-rfp-%28english-version_1.pdf

### Contact Information

* Contact Information Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Contact Information Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Information Phone: 613 971 795

Note that I reformatted the text to be more readable and clear. I also rephrased certain
